body:
This is a sub-set of #9235, including only the `wallet` dir and `util*` files.

Same-binaries check (see https://github.com/kallewoof/bitcoin/tree/no-using-namespace-wallet-util-unsquashed):
```
$ ../bitcoin-maintainer-tools/build-for-compare.py 9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1 d1382db42dce34c21dde2dabec96e93195625aee --executables "src/bitcoind,src/bitcoin-cli,src/bitcoin-tx"
[...]
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/repo/src'
>>> [do_build] Copying object files...
>>> [do_build] Performing basic analysis pass...
>>> [do_build] Use these commands to compare results:
>>> [do_build] $ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
>>> [do_build] $ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1 /tmp/compare/d1382db42dce34c21dde2dabec96e93195625aee
$ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
e949fef0c4e3c9fcd7927acfaca0737629caa82cc70218e483adbb1ecc9b8bfc  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1.stripped
e949fef0c4e3c9fcd7927acfaca0737629caa82cc70218e483adbb1ecc9b8bfc  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.d1382db42dce34c21dde2dabec96e93195625aee.stripped
59345e230f87b0f4a9a4f24b17dce83f783f13fe18fdaa9f88573400e6f8730c  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1.stripped
59345e230f87b0f4a9a4f24b17dce83f783f13fe18fdaa9f88573400e6f8730c  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.d1382db42dce34c21dde2dabec96e93195625aee.stripped
512ca5f056c02478c638bf48c056e8bb12d5a7ca924f972bf2f1f8a833e92bab  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1.stripped
512ca5f056c02478c638bf48c056e8bb12d5a7ca924f972bf2f1f8a833e92bab  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.d1382db42dce34c21dde2dabec96e93195625aee.stripped
$ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/9b4d2673b7757fd242b13c972c73897c92a90ce1 /tmp/compare/d1382db42dce34c21dde2dabec96e93195625aee
$ 
```

The affected files and namespaces:
```
util.cpp:                 std
utilmoneystr.cpp:         std
utilstrencodings.cpp:     std
utiltime.cpp:             std [unused]
wallet/db.cpp:            std
wallet/rpcdump.cpp:       std
wallet/rpcwallet.cpp:     std
wallet/test/wallet_tests.cpp: std
wallet/wallet.cpp:        std
wallet/walletdb.cpp:      std
```
title: [refactor] Remove using namespace <xxx> from wallet/ & util*
